name: jokes
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool joke_generator_3000.
Tool description: The best jokes, from the largest dataset, all in JSON
API description: Query for jokes by category or at random

Available categories for the category query string parameter are:

Animal
Other / Misc
Bar
One Liners
Puns
Lawyer
Sports
Medical
News / Politics
Men / Women
Gross
Blond
Yo Momma
Redneck
Religious
At Work
College
Lightbulb
Children
Insults
Knock-Knock
Tech
Yo Mama
Blonde

category.description: Category to filter jokes by. Defaults to None.
